channel.title: Differences between 308 and 517
channel.description:
First off hi, I don't think I've ever posted here before, but I've been messing around with RSPS for a while. I can't seem to find a definite answer to my issue. I'm looking for a base that's coded fairly well, that adding to and maintaining isn't like pulling teeth, I am also trying to find out what the exact differences are between a base server from something like Cheezscape, one of the 308 base servers, and a 517 base server.
So far the only differences I can find are that the 317 are usually filled with alot of pk, bases, and don't really have much else. Whereas the 517+ needs the 517+ cache, and it's own client, plus their isn't a huge 20k+ line client file, which is a huge plus, the thought of having the majority of the code in one file is a daunting issue for me. Considering I'm a modern day coder, that likes the code I'm working with to be normalized at least somewhat.
What I'm asking is that someone kindly point me to a empty base, with preferably no skills other then, moving and combat related skill(not a requirement, but I've never liked either of those lol), done that way I can truly code the server.
Any help with this would be great, even if it's just a point in the right direction.

item.title: Differences between 308 and 517
item.dc:creator: @fox536 fox536
item.description:
@fox536 wrote:

Could you point me to a resource to learn how to work with java packages?

nevermind found something… java is definitely alot harder to mess with than C, C++, C#, Ruby, Lua and all the other coding I’ve used lol xD

Read full topic

item.title: Differences between 308 and 517
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:9, topic:407591”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=508870.msg3691889#msg3691889 date=1312170976]
317’s have crappy graphics, less emotes, bad items and alot more. but they are easier to code. 508’s haicer graphics. a few more emotes and the items look better so does the map. but are alot harder to code
and yeah. not really supposed to post this here
[/quote]
They are both java… the only main difference is most of the 500+ servers are packaged, while most of the common 317s are classes all within the same directory. Difficulty of programming them is relative, actually hardly any differences in them.[/quote]

Most 317 servers are packaged… Considering most people leech PI now…

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:407591”]317’s have crappy graphics, less emotes, bad items and alot more. but they are easier to code. 508’s haicer graphics. a few more emotes and the items look better so does the map. but are alot harder to code
and yeah. not really supposed to post this here[/quote]

508 is not harder to code then a 317… The only reason people have difficulty is because they either don’t know the basics of Java or the RS2 protocol…

Read full topic

item.title: Differences between 308 and 517
item.dc:creator: @fox536 fox536
item.description:
@fox536 wrote:

ok well then is there a base 500+ that includes the basic things such as movement and the client side along with a 500+ cache, without all the skills(aside from maybe combat), npcs, and extra objects?

plus here is another question, is it possible to have construction or map editing using 317, or something like cheezscape?

Read full topic

item.title: Differences between 308 and 517
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:407591”]317’s have crappy graphics, less emotes, bad items and alot more. but they are easier to code. 508’s haicer graphics. a few more emotes and the items look better so does the map. but are alot harder to code
and yeah. not really supposed to post this here[/quote]
They are both java… the only main difference is most of the 500+ servers are packaged, while most of the common 317s are classes all within the same directory. Difficulty of programming them is relative, actually hardly any differences in them.

Read full topic

item.title: Differences between 308 and 517
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

To further clarify the 317(308 isnt used at all), and 500+ server types, Each one is a revision of RS. Differences include items, npcs, and graphics. Coding is pretty much the same, just the graphics are different and you have access to more up to date items/npcs/objects.

Read full topic

item.title: Differences between 308 and 517

item.description:
@fox536 wrote:

Thanks for the quick responses, and thanks for the three examples. I’ll check out those examples, I’ve been messing with the cheezscape but like I said it’s not a fun task to mess with 20k, none normalized code isn’t good lol.

Read full topic
